Improvements.Description: When dealing with errors or exceptional situations, it's better to use a logging system instead of System.err.println(). This will give you more control over the output, and it will also work better in multi-threaded environments.
The System.out.println() method is not recommended for production code. Instead, use a logging framework like Log4j or SLF4J. This provides more flexibility and control over log levels and outputs.
